summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to National Registered Agents, Inc. (for Expedia, Inc.) on January 27, 2020, commanding the production of all records related to flights purchased, booked, or taken by Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena includes a request for non-disclosure to preserve the confidentiality of the ongoing criminal investigation.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual for whom all flight records are being subpoenaed as part of the grand jury investigation.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is issuing a subpoena for Maxwell's flight records as part of a grand jury investigation.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issues a grand jury subpoena to Expedia, Inc. (via its agent) for all flight records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Subpoena Return Date
events.description: The date by which the subpoenaed records must be produced to the FBI or a representative must appear before the grand jury.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, New York, NY
New York County (Manhattan), New York, New York 10005
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued on January 27, 2020, targeting Expedia, Inc. for all flight records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The investigation involves alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. ยง 2423(a), which relates to transportation of minors for illegal sexual activity.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested non-disclosure of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the ongoing investigation.
The subpoena commands production of records by February 7, 2020, to the FBI at 26 Federal Plaza in New York.
The document confirms an active federal criminal investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's travel activities as of early 2020.
